altername_name: Ordeal in the Canyons of Zelaz
name: Canyons of Zelaz
overview: Published in RUN 1984/01 (Issue #1), and in Dansk RUN 84/2 (Nov/Dec 1984) and also in RUN Gamepack Disk. A Lunar Lander style game where you fly the treacherous canyons, it's risky business for even the best arcade pilot. Can you make it through? Released in Europe as Moonbase in the following: - King Size compilation (both disk and cassette versions) - King Size (Volume 1 & 2) - 50 Great Games - The Big 100
